SEARCH
Package hms.common.id

Class IdParser

Object
IdParser
public class IdParser extends Object
Parser for Ids of registered classes. This class is used to manage registered classes and their ID prefixes.

This is to ensure that each class has a unique Id prefix when generating Ids, therefore making an id unique across all classes in combination with the Id suffix.

See Also:
  • IdRegistry for managing the Id suffix.

  • Method Details

    • addClass

      static void addClass(Class<? extends IModel> clazz, String prefix)
      Adds a class to the registry with the specified prefix. This method is package-private and should only be called by the IdManager.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class to add to the registry.
      prefix - The prefix to use for the class.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
